channel.title: Faithful Word Baptist Church
channel.description: Fiery Independent Baptist Preaching, Soul-winning, King James Bible ONLY!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Fiery independent fundamental Baptist Preaching from this soul-winning, King James Bible-only Baptist church in Phoenix, Arizona!
channel.itunes:summary: Are you tired of boring, namby-pamby preaching? Are you looking for preaching that is dynamic, less shallow, straight to the point, and politically incorrect? Faithful Word Baptist Church is a soul-winning, King James Bible-ONLY, independent Baptist Church in Phoenix, Arizona. This may be the hardest preaching you have ever heard, yet it may also be the most doctrinal.
channel.itunes:author: Pastor Steven L Anderson
